full_text: No, it means true Clevelanders. If you don’t appreciate what Baker did for the Browns or how talented he is as a QB, or don’t see how wrong they did him for the sake of a serial sexual assailant, you’re not a true Clevelander. https://t.co/Q6mjxQerSf
